nav.div: Niles Community Schools » COVID 19 Info/Continuity of Learning » Internet Options for Niles Families

span.strong:
NOTE: Families please make sure to read the fine print and all the terms of service before signing up for one of these options.
AT&T

p.span: -Waiving data, voice, and text overage charges for any wireless customer experiencing hardship caused by coronavirus.

span.a: AT&T Home Internet for eligible limited income households

p.span: -Adding 15GBs of data to all mobile plans, even prepaid plans that include data
-Waiving late fees for bill payment, and will not terminate service for unpaid bills at least through May 13 if you
-Offers 10GB of free hotspot internet for free
-Partnering with SafeLink Wireless to provide Unlimited Talk, Text, & 5GB of data
-$15/mo for 2GB of data, unlimited talk and text
-Adding 10GB/month of data for many existing customers
-Unlimited Talk & Text plus 5GB of extra data free until at least April 28th for qualifying customers
-Unlimited data for 60 days to customers with metered data plans
-20GB of mobile hotspot to customers with hotspot capable devices
-Unlimited data to all data plans for at least March 13-May 12
-Payment plans for financial hardship
-Lifeline customers with voice only plans get 5GB/month through May 13.
-Internet Essentials Free to New Customers-60 days complimentary home WiFi internet if apply by April 30. (
-Existing customers: No disconnects or late fees, no data limits on home WiFi
-Public Xfinity Hotspots free to all

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: WiFi Internet access

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: -Go to

a.title: CovID 19 info
a.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: and enter your zipcode to find a hotspot near you. There are countless in the Niles, MI area.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: -If you have a Niles Community Schools device, then you can access the WiFi outside of any school building by using

p.span: NCSStudent

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: -Most restaurants, grocery stores and libraries have open access that you can reach from their parking lot.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: -Many carriers are increasing data or providing unlimited data. Check with your carrier to make your device a wifi hotspot.
